title: [SEC-01] Add unified auth middleware for execution APIs
body: Scope: enforce auth on /v1/jobs/*, /v1/workers/*, /v1/interrupts/*. DoD: missing credential returns 401; invalid credential returns 401; valid credential passes baseline API tests.

title: [SEC-02] Implement API key authentication
body: Scope: support key_id, hashed secret storage, key active/disabled state, and rotation-friendly model. DoD: disabled key is rejected immediately with 401 and covered by tests.

title: [SEC-03] Implement JWT authentication with JWKS
body: Scope: validate iss/aud/exp and cache JWKS for runtime verification. DoD: expired token and wrong audience are rejected; JWKS cache behavior is observable.

title: [SEC-04] Introduce minimum RBAC model
body: Scope: define admin/operator/worker roles and route-level permission matrix. DoD: unauthorized role access returns 403 and matrix is covered by automated tests.

title: [SEC-05] Persist audit logs for control-plane operations
body: Scope: record actor, action, resource, result, request_id, and timestamp for run/resume/replay/cancel/reject. DoD: 100 percent of key control actions produce durable audit entries.

title: [SEC-06] Add security regression test suite
body: Scope: add tests for auth bypass, privilege escalation, request_id spoof handling, and replay resistance baseline. DoD: CI has a dedicated security job and it is required for merge.

title: [DB-01] Complete PostgreSQL RuntimeRepository parity
body: Scope: implement PostgreSQL RuntimeRepository to match SQLite contract and semantics. DoD: same runtime repository test suite passes on sqlite and postgres backends.

title: [DB-02] Harden lease/attempt/interrupt transaction logic on PostgreSQL
body: Scope: enforce transaction boundaries and conflict handling for dispatch and ownership flows. DoD: concurrency tests show no double-dispatch and no inconsistent lease ownership.

title: [DB-03] Introduce schema migration workflow
body: Scope: add schema versioning with forward migrations and documented rollback path. DoD: clean init and incremental upgrade are repeatable in CI and local environments.

title: [DB-04] Add backend selection and startup health checks
body: Scope: allow runtime backend selection via config and fail fast on invalid DSN or missing schema. DoD: startup emits actionable error and exits non-zero for bad backend config.

title: [DB-05] Publish PostgreSQL backup and restore runbook
body: Scope: document and script backup, restore, and validation path for runtime data. DoD: one full rehearsal (backup to restore to resume execution) is recorded.

title: [DB-06] Add PostgreSQL integration matrix in CI
body: Scope: run key runtime tests on both sqlite and postgres, including crash recovery scenarios. DoD: CI blocks merge when either backend matrix fails.

title: [SCH-01] Add retry policies for attempts
body: Scope: support fixed and exponential backoff with max retry count. DoD: failed attempts retry according to policy and retry history is queryable.

title: [SCH-02] Add attempt timeout policy
body: Scope: define execution timeout and terminal behavior on timeout. DoD: timed-out attempts transition deterministically to configured terminal state.

title: [SCH-03] Introduce dead-letter queue model and APIs
body: Scope: persist unrecoverable attempts and expose list/inspect/replay APIs. DoD: DLQ attempts are visible and replayable through control-plane APIs.

title: [SCH-04] Add priority-aware dispatch
body: Scope: support attempt priority and prefer high-priority dispatch under mixed queues. DoD: load test shows lower wait latency for high-priority attempts.

title: [SCH-05] Add worker and tenant rate limits
body: Scope: implement configurable worker and tenant throttling integrated with backpressure decisions. DoD: over-limit traffic returns deterministic backpressure decisions and metrics.

title: [SCH-06] Build failover and conflict stress test suite
body: Scope: create fault-injection scripts for lease expiry, conflict, and failover recovery measurements. DoD: baseline report includes conflict rate, recovery latency, and throughput.

title: [OBS-01] Add end-to-end OpenTelemetry traces
body: Scope: instrument run/thread/attempt lifecycle with trace context propagation. DoD: one run can be traced end-to-end across API and worker flow.

title: [OBS-02] Expose Prometheus runtime metrics
body: Scope: expose queue depth, dispatch latency, lease conflict rate, and recovery latency metrics. DoD: /metrics endpoint is scrape-ready and metrics are documented.

title: [OBS-03] Provide Grafana dashboards and alert rules
body: Scope: add dashboard JSON and alert thresholds for error rate, recovery latency, and sustained backpressure. DoD: dashboard and alerts are validated against sample workload.

title: [REL-01] Add replay side-effect safety guard
body: Scope: persist effect log and idempotency fingerprint to avoid duplicated external side effects during replay. DoD: replay test proves no duplicate side-effect execution.

title: [OSS-01] Publish cargo-generate templates for service/worker/operator
body: Scope: package and document cargo-generate flow for the three starter archetypes. DoD: external user can scaffold and run each archetype with one command path.

title: [OSS-02] Complete production operations docs
body: Scope: publish deploy, upgrade, migration, SLO, and incident-response guides for operators. DoD: docs provide an end-to-end path from fresh deploy to production readiness.
